changeSet.comment: Removing ADD_GERMPLASM_LIST_ENTRIES, ADD_ENTRIES_TO_LIST, DELETE_GERMPLASM_LIST, REMOVE_ENTRIES_GERMPLASM_LISTS, CLONE_GERMPLASM_LIST and EDIT_LIST_METADATA permissions for roles that do not have Full permissions.
changeSet.sql:
# Insert inherited permissions of LISTS and MANAGE_GERMPLASM_LISTS. INSERT INTO role_permission(role_id,permission_id) SELECT rti.role_id, pti.permission_id FROM (SELECT DISTINCT(rp.role_id) AS role_id FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name IN ('LISTS', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM_LISTS') GROUP BY rp.role_id ) rti CROSS JOIN (SELECT permission_id FROM permission WHERE name IN ('SAMPLES_LISTS', 'GERMPLASM_LISTS', 'SEARCH_GERMPLASM_LISTS', 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM_LISTS', 'GERMPLASM_LIST_LABEL_PRINTING', 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM_LIST_UPDATES', 'REORDER_ENTRIES_GERMPLASM_LISTS') ) pti;
# Delete ADD_GERMPLASM_LIST_ENTRIES, ADD_ENTRIES_TO_LIST, DELETE_GERMPLASM_LIST, # REMOVE_ENTRIES_GERMPLASM_LISTS, CLONE_GERMPLASM_LIST and EDIT_LIST_METADATA from roles that do not have Full permissions. DELETE role_permission FROM role_permission WHERE permission_id IN (SELECT p.permission_id FROM permission p WHERE p.name in ('LISTS', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM_LISTS')) AND role_id IN (SELECT subA.role_id FROM (SELECT rp.role_id AS role_id FROM role_permission rp WHERE rp.role_id IN ( SELECT subB.rid FROM ( SELECT rp.role_id AS rid FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name in ('LISTS', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM_LISTS') GROUP BY rp.role_id ) AS subB ) ) AS subA );
